name: High-Flyers' Trampoline
description: A trampoline crafted from resilient fabric and reinforced with a metal frame, its decorative motifs bear the distinct flair of "Wavey Bay." Rumor has it that this trampoline is outfitted with a unique internal mechanism that greatly enhances its elasticity, and hence capable not only of launching multiple adults into the air with ease but also of enabling even novices to perform acrobatic flips. However, Paimon has reported feeling none of these effects during her trial. Then again, as someone capable of flight, she likely has little need for a trampoline to reach great heights...
